name: HeadBall!
description:
In this game you can play against your friend in a dramatic 1v1 on the pitch.

You cann shoot the ball with your head and every kind of stuff that comes to your head! To make it even more spicy there are obstacles placed in the arenas.

Have fun!

Upcoming Updates:

Alpha 1.6:  Map Update

  - new Maps

Alpha 1.8:  Cosmetic Update

   - new Gameart

   - particles/ post processing

Beta 1.1:  Feature Update

   - reworked menu

           -> including:  settings(sound, colors)

   - new gamemodes

   - player choosing

1.1.8 : Fixes & Addings:

   - new Input methods including controller

   - new gamemechanics: such as shooting, headers, power ups, etc.
